metadata.title: CVE-2022-48655 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:firmware: arm_scmi: Harden accesses to the reset domainsAccessing reset domains descriptors by the index upon the SCMI driversrequests through the SCMI reset operations interface can potentiallylead to out-of-bound violations if the SCMI driver misbehave.Add an internal consistency check before any such domains descriptorsaccesses.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
